[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@cerbos/embedded](./embedded.md)

## embedded package

Client library for interacting with embedded Cerbos policy decision points generated by [Cerbos Hub](https://www.cerbos.dev/product-cerbos-hub) from server-side Node.js and browser-based applications.

## Classes

<table><thead><tr><th>

Class


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[AutoUpdatingLoader](./embedded.autoupdatingloader.md)


</td><td>

Loads an embedded policy decision point bundle from a given URL, and polls for updates.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[Embedded](./embedded.embedded.md)


</td><td>

A client for interacting with an embedded Cerbos policy decision point (PDP).


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[Loader](./embedded.loader.md)


</td><td>

Loads an embedded policy decision point bundle from a given source.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[LoadError](./embedded.loaderror.md)


</td><td>

Error thrown when a [Loader](./embedded.loader.md) fails to load an embedded policy decision point bundle.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
